source:
'use client'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation'; import AdminLayout from '@/components/AdminLayout'; import Button from '@/components/Button'; import { Settings, User, Bell, Shield, Save, Key, Server, Eye, EyeOff, RefreshCw } from 'lucide-react'; interface SettingsTab { id: string; label: string; icon: React.ComponentType; } const tabs: SettingsTab[] = [ { id: 'general', label: 'General', icon: Settings }, { id: 'account', label: 'Account', icon: User }, { id: 'security', label: 'Security', icon: Shield }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: Bell }, { id: 'api', label: 'API & Integrations', icon: Key }, { id: 'system', label: 'System', icon: Server }, ]; export default function AdminSettingsPage() { const router = useRouter(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('general'); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [saved, setSaved] = useState(false); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [showApiKey, setShowApiKey] = useState(false); // Settings state const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ // General siteName: 'Agriko', siteUrl: 'https://agrikoph.com', adminEmail: 'admin@agrikoph.com', timezone: 'UTC', language: 'en', // Account username: 'agrikoadmin', email: 'agrikoadmin@agriko.com', displayName: 'Admin User', // Security twoFactorEnabled: false, sessionTimeout: '24', passwordExpiry: '90', // Notifications emailNotifications: true, orderAlerts: true, systemAlerts: true, marketingEmails: false, // API apiKey: 'sk-agriko-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx', webhookUrl: '', woocommerceKey: '', woocommerceSecret: '', // System maintenanceMode: false, debugMode: false, cacheEnabled: true, compressionEnabled: true, }); // Check auth on mount useEffect(() => { const token = localStorage.getItem('auth_token'); if (!token) { router.push('/admin/login'); } }, [router]); const handleInputChange = (field: string, value: any) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSave = async () => { setLoading(true); // Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); // Save settings to localStorage for demo localStorage.setItem('admin_settings', JSON.stringify(settings)); setLoading(false); setSaved(true); // Clear saved message after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => setSaved(false), 3000); }; const generateNewApiKey = () => { const newKey = `sk-agriko-${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}-${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`; handleInputChange('apiKey', newKey); }; const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'general': return (

General Settings

handleInputChange('siteName', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('siteUrl', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('adminEmail', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
); case 'account': return (

Account Settings

handleInputChange('username', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('email', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('displayName', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
); case 'security': return (

Security Settings

Two-Factor Authentication

Add an extra layer of security to your account

handleInputChange('sessionTimeout', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('passwordExpiry', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />

Active Sessions

You're currently logged in from 1 device

); case 'notifications': return (

Notification Preferences

Email Notifications

Receive notifications via email

Order Alerts

Get notified about new orders

System Alerts

Important system notifications

Marketing Emails

Promotional content and updates

); case 'api': return (

API & Integrations

Keep this key secure. Regenerating will invalidate the old key.

handleInputChange('webhookUrl', e.target.value)} placeholder="https://your-domain.com/webhook" className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />

WooCommerce Integration

handleInputChange('woocommerceKey', e.target.value)} placeholder="ck_..." className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
handleInputChange('woocommerceSecret', e.target.value)} placeholder="cs_..." className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
); case 'system': return (

System Settings

Maintenance Mode

Show maintenance page to visitors

Debug Mode

Show detailed error messages

Cache

Enable caching for better performance

Compression

Compress assets for faster loading

Database Status

Connected

PostgreSQL v14.5

Cache Status

Active

Redis 7.0.5

Server Load

Medium

CPU: 45% | RAM: 62%

); default: return null; } }; return (

Settings

Manage your admin panel configuration

{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{renderTabContent()}
{saved && (

Settings saved successfully!

)}
); }

Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

{ const currentValue = await this.getMemgraphMetric(metric);
          return currentValue !== null ? currentValue * (0.8 + Math.random() * 0.4) : null; }

suggestions.desc: Add {} brackets around the case block.

Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

'error' is defined but never used.
'error' is defined but never used.

messages.message: Unnecessary escape character: \/.

suggestions.desc: Remove the `\`. This maintains the current functionality.
Replace the `\` with `\\` to include the actual backslash character.
